newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-S&P rates QTC dual currency samurai AA.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-S&P rates QTC dual currency samurai AA.

text.p: Standard and Poor's Corp said on Friday it has assigned its AA rating to Queensland Treasury Corp's 30 billion yen dual currency samurai series 7 bonds maturing October 15, 1998.
S&P said the rating reflected that of QTC's guarantor, the state government of Queensland, for which it acts as central borrowing agency.
The ratings agency said the rating was constrained by the AA foreign currency sovereign rating of the Commonwealth of Australia.
"The foreign currency rating outlook is positive," S&P said.
